episodes.title: When A Cult Loses Their Cult Leader
episodes.description:
What happens to a cult when the leader — the one they worship, obey, and build their lives around — suddenly disappears? When the so-called “apostle” or “prophet” loses power, the entire illusion begins to crack. In this video, we take a deep look at what happens to a cult after their leader falls — the confusion, the cover-ups, the manipulation that follows, and the spiritual devastation left behind.

Apostle David E. Taylor is one of the most controversial religious figures in America, known for outrageous claims of face-to-face encounters with Jesus, extravagant spending, and a personality-driven ministry built entirely around himself. But what happens when that type of leader fades from the spotlight? What happens to the followers who built their faith on a man rather than on Christ?

This video exposes the dangerous dynamics of personality cults — from control and deception to the psychological toll it takes on members who believed they were serving God. We’ll explore the warning signs of cult behavior within churches, how followers get drawn in, and how they can find freedom in the true Gospel of Jesus Christ.

episodes.title: Inside the Cult of David Taylor
episodes.description:
In this detailed exposé, we delve into the controversial claims made by David Taylor, a self-proclaimed spiritual leader who predicts that Jesus will return before the end of the year. With a track record of bold assertions and a temper that raises serious questions about his conduct, this video aims to shed light on the troubling patterns behind his ministry.

From unverified prophecies to his frequent displays of anger, we examine the evidence and testimonies that paint a complex picture of his teachings and character. Is this the behavior of a true spiritual leader? Or is it a warning sign for those seeking genuine guidance and truth?

⚠️ Disclaimer: This video is intended for informational and educational purposes only. It is not meant to defame or insult but to encourage discernment and critical thinking. #davidtaylor #jmmi #apostledavidtaylor
